newsitem.title: ISRAEL: RESEARCH ALERT - Koor shares undervalued.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Koor shares undervalued.

text.p: Lehman Brothers said it was maintaining its 2-outperform ratings for Israel's Koor Industries Ltd, noting that the share was trading at a discount of approximately 23 percent to underlying value.
Analyst Elise Horowitz said she was maintaining her previous earnings estimates of 37.08 shekels per share in 1996 and 41.11 shekels in 1997.

"Koor is taking the necessary investments to position itself as a driving force both in the Middle East and overseas in its core areas: telecom and electronics, agro-chemicals and building materials," Horowitz said.
